section.title: 1st error: Writing inwardly
section.p: The writer focuses on his own experience with the product, not on what the product can offer to the reader.

section.title: 2nd error: Burying the lead
section.p: To keep the attention of the reader, it is important to sell your message succinctly and put your most important points first.

section.title: 3rd error: Mediocre meta material
section.p: Make intelligent use of meta information which will be picked up by search engines.

section.title: 5th error: Weak or no calls to action
section.p: Make clear which actions the reader can take.
